mention.text: The people inhabiting the Indus River valley
a civilized land where people had knowledge of iron implements and worked as labor , voluntarily
a civilized land where people had knowledge of iron implements and worked as labor , voluntarily or otherwise
the dynasties ruling the kingdoms of Magadha , Kosla , Kuru and Gandhara
Some of the most powerful of them
the advice given by Shri Krishna to the grief laden Arjun , who is terrified at the thought of killing his kin , on the battle ground
Singing the virtues of Dharma duty , the Gita , one of the most priced scriptures in Indian Mythology
Singing the virtues of Dharma duty
the Gita , one of the most priced scriptures in Indian Mythology
An ardent believer in communal harmony
